categories: Category:Shadows of the Empire Planets Guide fiction

nodes.text: A Trip to the Country is a roleplaying adventure outline in the September 1996 Shadows of the Empire Planets Guide, published by West End Games for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game as part of the Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire multimedia project. The adventure takes Rebel Alliance characters on a hunting expedition to Rodia while attempting to finalize an important business deal with local Rodians.
